ModMetaData.name: ReGrowth: Boreal
ModMetaData.author: Helixien
ModMetaData.description:
This is ReGrowth's Boreal Expansion, adding 3 new trees, new variations to the vanilla pine tree, two new plants and one new mushroom, which can be found in the wild and grown after completing the required research.
This mod is lightweight, it has no extra code and was designed to perfectly fit the vanilla game!
